description: The Ancient Remedy That Naturally Hydrates And Restores Dry And Damaged Hair!For centuries, the Berber women of Morocco have treated their hair and skin with pure organic Argan oil.Often calledliquid gold, argan oil is a super rich antioxidant, full of essential fatty acids and more thandouble the vitamin E found in olive oil.For even more benefits to your hair, this intense, restorative hair mask also contains organic Aloe Juice, organic Castor Oil,organic Coconut Oil and Pro-Vitamin B5 to deliver instant, long-lasting rejuvenation and life to your hair.- Penetrates hair shaft to restore essential moisture- Reconstructs and replenishes dull, weak, and damaged hair- Contains zero harsh chemicals, parabens, fragrances or artificial ingredients- Vegan certified, cruelty freeFair Trade - 100% PureOur organic Moroccan Argan oil is sourced from Berber women's co-operatives in the Argan region of Morocco.Your purchase directly benefits these women's cooperatives, who receive fair trade prices for their hand-crafted 100% pure Argan oil.Money Back Guarantee - You Risk Nothing!We Stand Behind Our Product. Try Our All Natural Restorative Hair Mask Risk Free For 30 Days.If You Are Not Completely Satisfied With The Results Simply Return It For A Full Refund!Click the 'Add to Cart' Button at the Top of This Page To Purchase Now!Please Read:We regularly sell-out of this product and do our best to restock within a couple of days.Please purchase now to avoid disappointment
title: Best Morocco Argan Oil Hair Treatment Mask - Organic Restorative Hydrating Mask Repairs Dry & Damaged Hair - Intense Leave In Conditioner, Detangler & Moisturizer Restores Natural Shine & Lustre - All Natural Ingredients, Safe For Color Treated Hair - With Continued Use This Effective Masque Will Completely Revitalize Your Hair - 30 Day Guarantee!
